name: BUBBLENOID
description:
Made for Mini Jam 84: Bubbles

inspired by breakout and arkanoid games. you can shoot a lot of bubbles, but be careful because it will affect the thickness of the paddle and if the bubbles run out it will be GAME OVER.

watch out for enemy fire too, because it can reduce your bubbles.

Power Ups

but don't worry, there are some power ups in this game.

  Bubble

increase your bubble (+1).

  Gun

shoot like a machine gun for a while.

  Shield

keep 100% attack for a while.

  Bomb

you will die instantly.

Controls

- move paddle [arrow]

- shoot bubble [Z]

- pause [esc]
